reviews.productTitle: Crayola Colored Pencils (36ct), Kids Pencil Set, Back to School Essentials, Must Have Classroom Supplies for Kids, Pre-Sharpened Coloring Book Pencils, 3+
reviews.text: The crayons themselves are great‚Äîjust what you‚Äôd expect from Crayola. They have vibrant color, strong tips, and a smooth texture that works well for both kids and adults. The quality is definitely there. However, I was really surprised and a bit disappointed that the packaging arrived damaged. For a trusted brand, I expected better care in the shipping or packaging process. Thankfully, the crayons inside were intact and usable. If you're looking for reliable, high-quality crayons, these are a solid choice‚Äîbut I hope future orders come in better condition.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2025
reviews.title: Great crayons, but disappointed by the packaging

reviews.text: The Crayola Colored Pencils (36ct) are a great set of pencils for kids to use for coloring and crafting. The set comes with a variety of bright and vibrant colors, making it perfect for creating detailed and colorful drawings. The pencils are easy to grip, with a smooth and even writing tip, making them easy for kids to use. The pencils are also made from high-quality material, ensuring that they last long and maintain their quality. Overall, the Crayola Colored Pencils are a great addition to any child's arts.

reviews.productTitle: Crayola Colored Pencils (36ct), Kids Pencil Set, Back to School Essentials, Must Have Classroom Supplies for Kids, Pre-Sharpened Coloring Book Pencils, 3+
reviews.text: I‚Äôve come to suspect that companies use Amazon to dump their ‚Äò2nds‚Äô (aka: defective) products. This purchase was yet another example. Box seemed a little odd on arrival. Like the pencils were having trouble fitting in it, which was odd. After taking them out, then trying unsuccessfully to return them to the box, I realized why. A bunch of them are warped. Slight curves and bends throughout. Isn‚Äôt noticeable when they‚Äôre sitting in a pencil cup. And still work just fine. But won‚Äôt be keeping them in the box for storage as I normally would, as they don‚Äôt fit. Keeping for the grandkids. But shall be buying myself another set (locally) that I can keep in the box so it can stay with my other to-go office supplies. And not sit in a pencil holder on my desk.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2025
reviews.title: Never thought I‚Äôd give Crayola 3-Stars.

reviews.productTitle: Crayola Colored Pencils (36ct), Kids Pencil Set, Back to School Essentials, Must Have Classroom Supplies for Kids, Pre-Sharpened Coloring Book Pencils, 3+
reviews.text: Colored pencils are a fantastic medium for artists of all levels, from beginners to professionals. They offer vibrant colors that blend beautifully, allowing for smooth gradients and detailed shading. Whether you‚Äôre using wax-based, oil-based, or watercolor pencils, they provide endless creative possibilities. I love how portable and easy to use they are perfect for sketching on the go or creating intricate artwork at home. Plus, they‚Äôre available in a wide range of sets, from basic to professional grade, so there‚Äôs something for everyone. Highly recommend for anyone looking to explore their artistic side!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2025
reviews.title: Vibrant and Versatile Art Tools!
